config.description:
A template for listing pages on the main layout of an entity.
Contained within the `MAIN` layout.

prop.name: background
prop.description: The background gradient to use for this template. Affects presentation.

prop.name: width
prop.description:
This controls how wide the template should render.
**Note**: When using `HALF`, you should take care to make sure that there is an adjacent template that also uses `HALF`.
